long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to see a preview of what the article in Hacker News looks like without navigating to that site?

Now you can! Install this extension and head to:
https://news.ycombinator.com/

This is a privacy friendly alternative than navigating to a random website before you decide if you are really interested in it. The previews are not perfect but they will give you an idea of what the website might look like.
